metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1898 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: The fb_unserialize function did not impose a depth limit for nesteddeserialization. That meant a maliciously constructed string could causedeserialization to recurse, leading to stack exhaustion. This issueaffected HHVM prior to v4.32.3, between versions 4.33.0 and 4.56.0, 4.57.0,4.58.0, 4.58.1, 4.59.0, 4.60.0, 4.61.0, 4.62.0.

criterions.comment: hhvm package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
